item.title: In Rainbows: Radiohead's Most Human Album
item.description: A review of Radiohead's In Rainbows and why it's their most emotionally grounded work.

item.title: New Blog
item.description: Started a blog. Trying to keep every page under 14KB because bloat sucks. I'll write about I2P, my projects, Nix, or whatever else I'm interested in.
